From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian drama film


Ishq-e-NadaanOfficial release posterDirected byAvishek GhoshWritten bySudeep NigamProduced byJyoti DeshpandeAvishek GhoshStarringMohit RainaLara DuttaNeena GuptaShriya PilgaonkarSuhail NayyarKanwaljeet SinghCinematographyGairik SarkarEdited byDnyanada SamarthMusic byRaja Narayan DebGulraj SinghProductioncompaniesJio StudiosAVMA MediaDistributed byJioCinemaRelease date
14 July 2023 (2023-07-14)
Running time106 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Ishq-e-Nadaan (transl. Innocent Love) is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language romantic drama film directed by Avishek Ghosh[1]  on his directorial debut. It stars Mohit Raina, Lara Dutta, Neena Gupta, Shriya Pilgaonkar, Kanwaljeet Singh, Suhail Nayyar and Mrinal Dutt with an ensemble cast. [2]
The film premiered directly at JioCinema on 14 July 2023.[3] [4][5]


Synopsis[edit]
"The heartwarming romance story, situated in a bustling city, follows the experiences of its characters through friendship and unwavering love."[6]

Cast[edit]
Mohit Raina as Ashutosh
Lara Dutta as Ramona Singh
Neena Gupta as Charulata
Shriya Pilgaonkar  as Siya
Suhail Nayyar as Piyush
Kanwaljeet Singh as Subhash Kapoor
Mrinal Dutt as Raghav
Samvedna Suwalka as Meenakshi Acharya
Anshu Varshney
Deepika Amin as Rekha
Gaurav Sharma as Mahesh Acharya
Pankhuri Gidwani
Manmeet Singh Sawhney as Satpal Singh
Production[edit]
The film started in 2021 and was wrapped in June 2022.[7] [8][9]
